add-product.title: Name
add-product.youtube: Youtube: (The VideoId - for example if the link is https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KBMO_4Nj4HQ, the videoId would be KBMO_4Nj4HQ (The whole text after v=))
add-product.info.stock: If you enter the value "- 1" in the Inventory field, no inventory will be carried out. Thus, the visitor can buy the product an unlimited number of times in your shop.
add-product.info-purchase-type: Please select at least one type of purchase.
add-product.please-wait: Please wait... This window will close automatically.
